comments.body: Once the feedstock is created, I can help configure builds for these platforms, presuming the package builds on them in the first place.

Unfortunately, the package doesn't build on OSX and windows as you can see from the checks [here](https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/runs/1878807711), due to combability issues on OSX and required libraries not available on Windows. But the developer is currently attempting to port the code to OSX and possibly windows.
